醦字的基本解释

醦
chǎn
醋。

醦
chěn
醋。
醋味。

醦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chěn］
［《廣韻》初朕切，上寢，初。］
［《廣韻》所斬切，上豏，生。］
醋。

醦字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【酉字部】　醦； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1287第05
【廣韻】【集韻】?所斬切，音摻。醋味。【博雅】醦，酢也。　又【廣韻】初朕切【集韻】楚錦切，?音墋。義同。　又【廣韻】醉甚。　又【集韻】初斂切，音䤘。酢貌。

醦字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
醦字的起名意思

暂无。

Glutinous
Basic explanation of words
Glutinous
chǎn
vinegar.
Glutinous
chěn
vinegar.
Vinegar taste.
Glutinous
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [chěn]
["Guangyun" I cut at the beginning, went to bed, at the beginning. ]
["Guangyun" cuts and cuts, goes up and gives birth. ]
vinegar.
Glutinous
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [You Zi Department] 　醦; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1287 No. 05
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? The cut is cut, the sound is mixed. Vinegar taste. 【Bo Ya】Fresh, glutinous rice.　[Guang Yun] Chu Zhen cut [Ji Yun] Chu Jin cut,? Yin Chang. The same meaning.　[Guang Yun] Very drunk.　[Jiyun] At the beginning, it is converging and cutting, and the sound is wa. Appearance.
